javelin.controller.action

Class Charge

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.controller.action.Action
      • javelin.controller.action.Target
        • javelin.controller.action.Fire
          • javelin.controller.action.Charge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ActionDescription, AiAction

    public class Charge
extends Fire
implements AiAction
    Charging is a special full-round action that allows you to move up to twice your speed and attack. You must move at least 10 feet (2 squares) and may move up to double your speed directly toward the designated opponent. You must have a clear path toward the opponent. After moving, you may make a single melee attack. You get a +2 bonus on the attack roll and take a -2 penalty to your AC until the start of your next turn.
    See Also:
